document.full_text: americans paused in somber reflection on monday to honor the men and women of the armed services who died fighting the nations' wars -- and to show solidarity for the thousands more now in campaigns overseas.
document.title: memorial day marked by somber rites for fallen
lines_and_colors: americans paused in somber reflection on monday to honor the men and women of the armed services who died fighting the nations' wars -- and to show solidarity for the thousands more now in campaigns overseas.
